Later mom, ...MUCH later!" you answered with a sigh, as you passed your mom's head to Angela for her to hold and plucked Mr Johnson's head off your mom's shapely body.

"Okay, give me my mom" you said to Angela, realizing how weird that actually sounded. You returned your mom's head back to its rightful body and she instantly started acting normal again. "Sorry mom, gotta run for a sec!" you then said, returning across the street to put old My Johnson's weathered head back on his body.

"That's that done!" Angela muttered, as the two of you left his house and closed the door behind you. "Now what?" she asked.

"Now we swap back...
15113111122111111121222122221.title: Begin swapping back your family.

choices: I'd say we look at the mall.
I'd say we take care of the mess instead of Lauren.
151131111221111111212221222211.content:
"Okay now that that's done we should concentrate on getting Melissa's and Britney's heads back on their bodies. The Parker twins are living next door anyway.", you suggested and Angela agreed. No surprise. She was you after all.

You two went to the house of the Parkers and fortunately the two little kids with the heads of your sisters were coming out of the house holding each hand of their mother. Her mother had the head of their dad on her head. "Seems I was lazy with her.", you chuckled to make you feel more comfortable with the mess you did last night.

"Good morning.", you greeted the three with a big smile. You then proceeded over to the girls and grabbed both her heads simultaneously. Before her mother could react the heads were off and the mother let go off their little hands. "Morning, Jason.", she smiled and continued walking, completely ignoring the motionless girl bodies. You handed the heads over to Angela and got the head of the mother as well. "It's the best if she doesn't wander off too far. The girls are still young.", you explained, put the head safely on the grass and then went back to your own house.

You walked over to your twin-headed sisters. "Hey Jason.", smiled Melissa and looked at Angela. "You gonna introduce us?", she asked but you shook your head. "Not now!", you said and grabbed their heads. They popped off and your sisters' bodies just stood there motionless. "Put them on.", you said to Angela. "I'll put the twins' heads and their mother's...well actually their father's head back on. Their dad should be at work right now. He always leaves very early.".

Outside you first put the twin's heads back on and the right after that the father's. "Mornin' Jason.", the two girls greeted you right after they had taken their mother's hand. You smiled at them and then got back together with Angela. "Now we should continue with dad. We don't know who this geek is but we know who the boy is.".

You then went over to the Grayson's house and quickly found your dad's head (one a boy's body) playing with some toy's in front of the house. "Too easy...", you thought and grabbed the head. Quickly you had exchanged your dad's head and your family was nearly back to normal. "Now the only one left is Lauren.", you looked at Angela. "I assume you have no idea as well.". She nodded. Angela then looked at you and said: "..."
151131111221111111212221222211.title: ...my sisters Melissa and Britney".

1511311112211111112122212222111.content:
"Okay, I need to get Lauren back to normal, so...where do all the geeks hang out?" you inquired of Angela, who just shrugged. "If you don't know...then neither do I. I don't even know who I really am" Angela then pointed out, feeling more than a little frustrated. "I know" you said, clicking your fingers, "that new comic and model kit store in the mall, it does all Star Wars and Star Trek crap, that's the best place to start" you said, as you and Angela took note of a passing car. There seemed to be a little boy driving, no older than five, but the boy's head was actually on his mother's chubby, adult body, and his mother's head was attached to her son's skinny little body in the back seat of the car.

"You really made a mess of things, you know!" Angela told you, frowning. "Yeah...I know, but at least it wasn't done consciously" you muttered, as if that was any kind of an excuse.

"Something tells me we're going to be seeing many more weird sights on the way to the mall" Angela then sighed, as the two of you walked over to the bus stop, where a head swapped couple in their 30's were already sat waiting. The man's handsome head now adorned his wife's svelte form, dressed in a low-cut, blue sweater, a long, floral skirt and a pair of flat sandals, and the wife's pretty, blonde head was on her husband's body, casually dressed in a t-shirt, a pair of feaded jeans and some sneakers.

"What have I done?" you mumbled to yourself, shaking your head, as you and Angela tried your best not to stare at the couple. Luckily the bus wasn't long in coming, but when you got on it...you saw the bus driver's middle-aged, paunchy body sporting the ponytailed head of a 10-year old girl. "Come on kids, I ain't got all day" the girl's voice snapped.

"Yeah...MANY more weird sights" you turned to Angela, rolling your eyes.
1511311112211111112122212222111.title: I'd say we look at the mall.

15113111122111111121222122221111.content:
"Here we are.", you sighed finally stepping out of the freak show bus. You had really made quite a mess and it will take quite a while to make everything normal. "Okay now that we're here, we have to find this store.", you said and looked at Angela. "Well, you know I have no idea. Let's just look for it.".

The two of you walked through the mall having no idea where this new store might exactly be. You were not very often here and your sense of direction was one of the worst in the world. "Well, at least we can admire my work.", you said, looking at a swapped family. The mother had the 13 year old daughter's head, the father had the mother's head and the daughter had the father's.

The people who had not been swapped by you were a minority. The mall was rather full, you had to concentrate to avoid crashing into people. "Watch yourself!", grunted an old man with the body of a cheerleader. "Weird...", you mumbled and continued walking with Angela by your side.

"We have absolutely no idea where to find this stupid store.", you sighed, scratching your head. Just then someone bumped into you. This resulted in pressing your hand against the back of your head and lead to the fact that your head popped off. Angela looked at your head rolling away. "Oh my god!", she exclaimed and followed your head which stopped right beside a purse.

The purse belonged to a black, 42 year old woman. She had sagging D-cups, was wearing jeans and red shirt. She was not fit but on the other hand not too fat. She was sitting on a bench and had her purse put right next to her. She was about to go and grabbed her purse but unfortunately grabbed your head.

Even more unfortunate for you was that your powers did not allow your head to be popped off for too long. If they had the chance to fix it they did it. So as soon as the woman grabbed your head she let her head pop off on her own with the other hand and put your head on her body.

Angela finally caught up and looked at you, your head now sitting on the woman's body. "Jason? You okay?", she asked you. You blinked your eyes and looked at her.
15113111122111111121222122221111.title: Arriving at the mall.

151131111221111111212221222211111.content:
"Er...someone bumped into you and your head went flying,"...Angela explained. "and it was weird, that woman just automatically switched your head with her own"...she continued. You looked down at yourself and gasped in shock. "Holy crap!" you blurted out..."I take it back, I'm not alright" you shouted at your teenage companion.

"Where's my body?" you then asked, looking around frantically, shifting in your seat and feeling your massive boobs jiggle on your chest. "I can't stay like this" you whined.

"I don't know...oh wait, there it is!" Angela pointed out. The black woman's head was now atop your body and was walking away from you both. "Don't just stand there looking dumb, get it back" you shouted to Angela, who sprinted off ahead, allowing you follow at a slower pace...after you had manouvered your larger, female frame off the bench.

"Excuse me...lady!" Angela shouted, grabbing one of Jason's arms and spinning the woman around.

"Lady, who the hell you calling lady?" the woman replied. "Do I look like a girl to you?" she snapped. "My name's Jason!" she stated. You, having finally caught up, were just in time to hear her say that. "No your not, I'm Jason!" you stated, adjusting your bra strap.

"Er...yeah right!" the black woman frowned. "You look more like a Latisha than a Jason" she laughed.

"Hey...she's right!" you laughed, retrieving the woman's (now your) ID from her purse.

"Never mind the yapping, " Angela grumbled at you, "Just put things right" she said quietly, gesturing to the woman whose head was now securely fastened atop your male, teenage body.
151131111221111111212221222211111.title: "Yeah, I think so... What happened?"

1511311112211111112122212222111111.content:
Suddenly the woman who had your body made a run for it. "Hey wait!", you shouted and tried to follow her but your heavier female body made it impossible for you to follow her through the masses of people currently at the mall.

"Just great!", you sighed. "We got another Jason who is even more unreliable than Angela was...". Angela meanwhile tried to follow the woman but was soon outdistanced by her. "Damn...", she muttered and went back to you. "I lost her... There are just too many people in the mall.", she apologized.

"Never mind. It wasn't your fault. I should have taken more care where I put my hand.", you said. "But how is it possible? When you're awake the powers don't work like that. She should have thought she was Latisha and not you.". You nodded and thought about this for a while.

"Well, I guess you know what I think. Apparently the "life swap" function, if we want to call it that, doesn't have anything to do with me being asleep. It seems it just works if I'm doing a swap unconsciously. When I sleep I don't decide what I swap and its the same case here. I think that's some kind of defense mechanism to insure I don't get in trouble.", you explained to your female clone, if you could call Angela that.

"Yeah... So what're we doing now? Can you even swap anymore? Who's to say that your powers are not with her now?", she asked, and you simply grabbed both your heads and exchanged them. "Still works.", you grinned, your head now back on Angela's body. You them swapped back immediately. "Okay, we know you can still swap. What should we do now?", she asked. "I mean, we can't let her run around as Jason.".

"Uh-hu. That's a problem. But we can't help it, can we? She disappeared somewhere and the mall is so crowded we can't find her. I suggest we should look for Lauren's head and my body afterwards.", you suggested. "Yeah but it would be even harder to find her if we lose too much time.". She was right with that. Even though you were thinking alike, there were a dozen of places you could be. "Well, I say we..."
1511311112211111112122212222111111.title: The woman bolts from you.

15113111122111111121222122221111111.content:
"Find the woman can wait, I want to finish getting my family back to normal" you mumbled to Angela, even as you stared down and grimaced at the large, sagging boobs on your ebony body...squeezing them in your hands. "Come on, we're going to the comic store" you then gestured in the direction of the store that was in effect 'geek paradise'.

"Stop feeling your boobs dude!" Angela told you as you set off walking, she was still speaking how you normally did.

"I can't help it, they're...uncomfortable. And heavy!" you grumbled, as you adjusted the bra that was not only supporting your massive twin weights, but which was also digging into your rib cage.

"People are staring!" Angela then muttered to you quietly, as she swept her hair from her face.

"They've got no right to stare, most of them look just as ridiculous as I do, they just don't know it" you responded, as you looked to your left (seeing a middle-aged man with his head on a toddler's body and vice versa) and then to your right (seeing a teenage couple, their heads switched with the boyfriend's parents, both middle-aged. The girl's head was on the father's body and the boy's head was on his own mother's body).

"Yeah...you're right," Angela replied with a shrug, ..."But they aren't feeling themselves up in public" she pointed out.

"Only because they think they've always had those bodies" you sighed. "Otherwise they'd be doing to exact same thing as I'm doing" you continued.

Arriving at the comic store, you took a quick look around to see if you could see a male dweeb's body underneath the stunning head of a 23-year old woman (your sister Lauren).
15113111122111111121222122221111111.title: ...look for Lauren's head.

"There he is!", you pointed at the geek who had Lauren's head on his body. He was currently looking through some comics while talking to his fellow nerds. "I'm really excited about DC's new 52.", said the one with Lauren's head to his friends not looking up from the boxed in which the comics were held.

"That's the worst they could have done. 70 years of continuity is just erased.", said one of his friends who had the head of an old lady on his skinny body. "It's not. Most things have still happened and some don't. There is nothing erased.".

You interrupted their nerdy conversation and grabbed Lauren's head, leaving the nerd's body motionless. You quickly left the store with Angela. "I'm really too old for this stuff.", you said to her. She looked at you and grinned. "I know, but actually you're younger than half of the customers in the store were.".

"You know what I mean.", you sighed and continued you're way back home. "Right. I think we might have a problem now.", you said just as you two have left the entrance of the mall.

"Yeah, that was not what I meant, but you're right. I just thought that we'll need the whole day just to bring the nerd and Lauren back to their right bodies.", you explained. "Now you're exaggerating. We don't need the whole day. Maybe till 1pm.".

"It will certainly need some time. Considering we have to wait till we get to Lauren.". Angela looked at you. "Well, there might be another possibility and you know it. It is just something you don't want to do.".

You sighed. "Yeah, until I get my body back I'm this woman no matter with whom I swap. The only solution there is, is to push my head off and get someone from my family grab it while it is on the ground.". Angela nodded just to give you a sign that she is listening. Of course she knew what you thought, she was you after all.

"But we have no idea what would happen to them. Would they think they're me or the woman?". "Personally I would say that she would think that they're the woman. Wouldn't make sense that they thought they were you. What defense mechanism would that be?", she explained. "Yeah, you're right like always.", you grinned and got into the bus.

"After Lauren is back to normal we should really find that woman.". Angela shook her head. "Nah, she thinks she's us... er you right? So she will go back to your house sooner or later.".

"Hey, it's not like I volunteered for this. If you had asked me you could have kept this 13 year old girl's body. It's just strange to think that this was the body I was born with, and also I have to admit that it feels amazing.", said Angela offended.

"Okay. Then we've still got your head on your mom's body. It's strange to think of her as not being my mom.", she continued. "Yeah. Her head is on that Latisha's body. And Latisha's head is on my original body. Worst of all: She thinks she's me. Just like mom thinks she's Latisha.".

"So, we should try to find this Latisha. Both. The Mom-Latisha and the Jason-Latisha.", suggested Angela. You nodded.

You both soon arrived at the mall and went as quickly as possible through the crowdy mall to the comic store. There you put the nerd's head back on his body. He blinked confused and wondered where his friends went.

You quickly left the store because you both were being stared at. Girls still looked kind of strange in that store, especially one your mom's age.

15113111122111111121222122221111111122.title: Latisha was gone.

"We really ought to look for Mom-Latisha. I don't want to stay like this or have this Latisha's head on her body.", you explained. "But we know absolutely nothing about this Latisha aside from her name, that she is black, slightly overweight and has mom's head on her shoulders.", Angela replied.

"Yeah... You've got a point. Do you remember anything about her? Did she say something where she would be heading to when you were talking to her?", you asked her. She shook her head. "No... Wait. You showed me the ID just before Jason-Latisha ran away, right? I think I can still remember her address, I think.".

"You do? That's wonderful!", you exclaimed happily. "Where does she live?". Angela closed her eyes to concentrate herself, just like you did everytime you had to concentrate. "Let me think... Levin Str... 14 Levin Str... I think.", she said slowly. You began thinking about it. "I know where this is, just a few blocks from the mall. Come on.", you said. "I know that you know it...", whispered Angela to herself and followed you.

It took you quite a while to get out of the crowdy mall but as soon as you were outside your path fastened because you both could walk faster considering the realtively emptiness of the streets in contrast to the mall. You yawned being quite tired from all the walking and swapping you did today. It felt like you were just running back and forth the whole day.

When you arrived there you began looking for the house and soon found it. "And now? What shall we do now?", Angela asked although she already knew what you were going to say. "We'll ring the bell of course. ", you answered. "She'll hopefully open the door, I'll grab the head and we go back home.". Angela grinned. "I knew you'd say this. What about when someone else opens? Then we'll ask for her or you pretend you're a friend of hers, right? After all everyone thinks you're... your mother.". No matter how long she had to getting used to her new life she could not forget being Jason.

"Completely right. It's like you read my mind.", you grinned and rang the door bell. And the big question is: Who opens the door?
151131111221111111212221222211111111222.title: ...look for Mom-Latisha.

1511311112211111112122212222111111112221.content:
Luckily for you, it was mom who had Latisha's body, who opened the door. "Hi.", you grinned slyly, and you grabbed your mother's head by her hair and it popped off. "That's done. Nearly too easy.", you said out loud and closed the door. "We deal with her tomorrow. We have to get her original head anyway.", you explained to Angela although it was completely unneccessary. You yawned again. "Man, I'm really tired from all the walking and swapping.".

Angela looked at you with fear in her eyes. "You can't sleep!", she said. "You know what happens. Everything we've done so far will be in vain.". You sighed. "I know... But when we got back home it'll be late and we'll find it hard to find the people or even get to them. I'd say we get back home. Jason-Latisha should already be there and I can swap myself with her, although we'll keep her head disembodied. Her body is here after all. Also we can't risk another Jason running around.".

Angela nodded. "Uh-hu. But what about me? I've got to get back home to my 'mom'...", she said sadly. "Right... Totally forgot that... And when I'm not sleep-swapping I can't get your head on anybody in the house and everyone would assume you're that person.". You thought about it for a while, meanwhile you had gotten to the bus stop.

"How about this? You should have a phone somewhere in your pockets. I at least think I put it in there before I left your house.", you suggested. "Call your mom, tell her you're having a sleep-over with a friend and that you'll be back home tomorrow evening. She might probably not allow you it but just tell her that you'll do it anyway and that you're old enough to make your own decisions or something like that.".

Angela got out the phone and did just like you told her. Atfer a five minute long phone talk she hang off and grinned at you. "It worked.". You smiled. "Great. You're staying over. You have to keep me awake.", you explained. "Yeah, I know.".

You both then got off the bus after another long and uneventful bus ride. "I really hate buses now.", you mumbled and walked into the direction of your home. There you grabbed the door key and entered the house along side Angela. "I'm back home!", you screamed. You quickly got up the stairs and entered your room.
1511311112211111112122212222111111112221.title: Mom-Latisha

1511311112211111112122212222111111112221.content:
Fortunately, Jason-Latisha was already home. "Hey, honey.", you smiled and got over to her. You used you manicured hand and grabbed Latisha's head before she could ask what you want or who Angela was. You quickly exchanged heads and found yourself back on your own body. "How I missed you.", you whispered happily to your body which was laying on the bed. You quickly got up and got Latisha's head. You did not want any strange questions asked by her.

You then got mom's head which Angela was carrying in that moment. Your mom blinked. "Oh my... What do I do here? Sorry to bother you, honey.", she smiled at you. "And thanks mom that you allow that Angela is slepping-over.", you said and your mom who was still confused simply nodded. "No... problem...?", she said and got out of your room.

"Now that that's done... We have to stay awake the whole night now.", you said to her. It was then that it occured to you what Angela really was beside someone who thought she was you. She was a girl. You're age to be precise. You gulped.

Angela looked at you and knew what you were thinking. "Don't. Even. Think. About. It!", she said with a stern look. "I might really be a girl but in my mind I'm a boy. You to be precise. This would just be gross to make out with myself or something like that.". You looked at her. "But you wouldn't be making out with yourself. You're not really me.", you explained. "You know what I mean!", she said and sat down on the bed crossing her arms.

"At least this is kinda girly on her...", you thought. "Okay okay. Let's just get this over with, okay?", you said. "No kissing, no making out, just keeping me awake.". Angela looked at you nodded slightly.

After an uneventful dinner with your family, where your sister were really interested in Angela and asked her everything they wanted to know, you both got back up to your room and decided to watch some movies. "Just 10 hours to go...", you mumbled popping in a DVD.
1511311112211111112122212222111111112221.title: Jason-Latisha is there.

choices: A couple who gets married today and wanted to sleep together the night before.
1511311112211111112122212222111111112221.content:
Both of you fell asleep. Angela was woken up by something moving in the room. "Mh?". Angela's eyes grew wide instantly as she noticed that you were gone and that you both fell asleep. "Oh no!", she whispered and jumped up from the bed. She went to the window to see if you may be outside. There she saw something fast running over the grass and suddenly something came the door. She quickly turned around and saw you, sleeping.

It seemed, even though your eyes were closed, that you were looking at her and shortly thought about what you should do. Then without a warning you dashed towards her with super-human speed. Before Angela could react, she wanted to scream "No", you already got her head in your hand and everything went black for her.

"Noooooo!", screamed Angela and noticed that she just sat up in a bed. "What the? Were am I?", she asked and was confused were she was. She looked around. She was in a big bedroom. There was a make-up table, a big waderobe. She looked at the bed. It was a king-sized bed and had red bed sheets.

"You shouldn't have fallen asleep.", she mumbled, looking at the bed. She looked over to the window. She did not recognize anything outside. "Great and god knows where I am.", she sighed and then noticed that someone was laying next to her, with the bed sheet up to his neck.

She looked at the person's head and noticed that it was your head! "Jason! Wake up!", she said and shook your head. You grimaced. "Mh... Five minutes, ok?", you said sleepily and turned away from her.

"No! You get up now! You sleep-swapped again.", she said. Your eyes grew wide just like Angela's did before. "No no no no no.", you mumbled and turned back to her. "I... but... we... how...", you asked her ,looking in her face.

"We must have fallen asleep and are now god knows where.", she said. "And we can really be everywhere. The last thing I remember before you grabed my head was that you were moving with superhuman speed. That explains how it was possible for you to make so many swaps in just one night.", she explained.

"Great. We have to find out where we are and who we are.", you said and sat up. It was then that you both noticed that you had a female body while Angela had a male. But who were the people you got the bodies from?

154.content:
Professor Charles William Bennet is the name of the inventor, he has a brilliant mind and is well known throughout his community and indeed the country. With several unique patents already attributed to him, he has now invented a wonderous device with an hitherto unknown power. Professor Bennet is 54 years old, is a slender man with grey hair and spectacles, and he is also known for his eccenticities. He owns a large house with several servants at his disposal and he is a fair man...although he does have a temper when angered.

First we need to establish a time and a country which this story takes place.
154.title: 8th Story = An eccentric inventor.

1541.content:
The year is 1881: The place is Eversham, a small town outside London.

"Not going to turn in for the night yet Professor?" the housekeeper Martha Wickham said in a gentle tone as she poked her head through the door of Professor Bennet's laboratory. Martha was a meek woman in her late 60s, her greying hair was kept in a bun and she was always attired in a long grey dress, an apron and dark, lace-up shoes. She had worked for the professor for over 25 years and was his most trusted servant.

"No, not quite yet Martha." an exhausted Charles replied, as he tinkered with the latest device he had spent years designing and building. "Damned...infernal eyesight!" he then grumbled angrily, surprising his mild-mannered housekeeper.

"Professor!! Such language!" she exclaimed, drawing an apology from Charles.

The professor then looked up from his device and straightened his glasses. "I don't approve of getting old, do you my dear? My faculties have really been letting me down lately, and even with my spectacles on I can barely see everything that I need to in order to accomplish my work" he said.

"Unfortunately Professor, we don't have a choice in growing old" Martha smiled, "And no...I don't like it either" she chuckled.

"I doubt anyone does." Charles sighed, before resuming his tinkering on his device, which was about the size of a small carriage clock. Martha studied the device for a moment but knew she wouldn't be able to wrap her simple mind around its intended functionality. She just looked towards the floor, then decided to let her master get on with his work. "I'll send young Elsie in with some tea for you sir" she mumbled to the professor, before leaving the room.

Martha then made her way down into the kitchen and found the 23-year old maid, Elsie Watkins, sat at the table reading.

"Oh, h...hello ma'am." Elsie stuttered, as she got to her feet.

Luckily Martha was as lenient a housekeeper as she was an effective one. "Will you please take some tea up to the professor. He's in his laboratory" she addressed Elsie, who was attired in her usual black dress, white apron/hat, black stockings and black, 2-inch heeled shoes.

"When isn't he in his laboratory?" Elsie replied, rolling her eyes.

"That'll do Elsie!" Martha stated.

"Yes ma'am! Sorry ma'am!" I'll take the tea up as soon as its ready" Elsie apologized.

"Very good! I'm going to turn in for the night" Martha nodded, informing Elsie of her intentions. Then she exited the kitchen and left Elsie standing there alone. The young woman immediately set about preparing the tea, and after putting the kettle on the stove, she sat back down and picked up her book again. Elsie was a pretty, brown-haired young woman, about 5' 5" in height and had a slender build (C-Cup breasts). She had been born and raised in Eversham, and she was very intelligent compared to most other lowly-born people of the time. Her ability to read gave her a distinct advantage in life, but she was held back by the very fact that she had been born a girl. Such were the times.

Upon hearing the kettle whistling, Elsie took it off the stove and poured the contents into the expensive teapot that was already on the tray. She then gathered together two equally elegant cups, a spoon, the sugar pot and the cream and put those all on the tray as well.

Carefully lifting the tray, Elsie then began making her way upstairs, passing (and greeting) the house butler Edward (age 40) along the way. As with most butlers, Edward was a tall man, he had a receding hairline and he was always immaculately dressed in his uniform. Edward was in charge of the two other male servants, the 37-year old cook - Jonas, and the 52-year old gardener Ernest. Edward was also turning in for the night, since it was passed midnight and his duties were done for the day.

"Goodnight Edward." Elsie said politely as she passed.

"Goodnight Elsie." came the response.

The young maid was soon up at the professor's laboratory, and holding the tray in one of her dainty hands she knocked on the door with the other. "Yes, come in!" the prfessor called out in a clear voice. Elsie stepped inside the room and eagerly looked around, it always thrilled her to be around her master's inventions. "Your tea sir!" she said, resting the tray down on the table next to the professor.

"Ahh yes, thank you." Charles muttered gratefully, hardly looking up from his work.

As Elsie poured him a cup of tea and added his usual two sugar lumps, she marveled at the device he was working on. She knew all too well just how long the professor had been working on it. Almost the entire four years she had worked in the house. She considered asking him what it was, but...it wasn't her place to ask such questions. Instead she just let her imagination run wild.

"You may turn in now if you like my dear, I'll be doing so myself shortly." the professor told Elsie.

"Thank you sir." Elsie responded with a smile and a curtsey. "Enjoy your tea sir." she added, before leaving the room. But instead of going back down to the kitchen, Elsie remained outside the laboratory, peeking through the keyhole...until the professor finally went to bed. She then crept back into the room to get a closer look at the device. She knew she was risking her job, but she couldn't help herself.

Glancing through the professor's notes, Elsie discovered the device was something called...
1541.title: 19th Century England.

choices: He asks Elsie to come to London with him.
He invites her into his laboratory for a brief tour.
He forbids her from going into his laboratory again.
15411.content:
Elsie gasped, covering a gloved hand to her mouth. Sure enough, scrawled on paper in hurried handwriting was a diagram showing the small, clock-shaped device. The same device that rested on master Charles' desk. Next to the diagram were notes, some scratched out and edited, some revised and re-revised like the ravings of a madman.

A body exchanger?

All the lights in the laboratory were off save for the lantern Elsie brought in with her. She turned the flame lower, watching the light dance dimly against the paper. She had to be quiet; six months ago the professor began resting here, next to his laboratory, rather than his bunk on the second floor of the house. He made Edward transport downstairs his bed, dresser, and personal effects to a closet adjoining the laboratory. Martha wouldn't allow it, God bless her, but her master was possessed to finish his invention and his body had begun to fall ill of late. Now, Elsie understood his haste... the device was almost complete. Just a few more materials to gather, importantly some strangely powered dynamo to give power to the contraption.

Elsie felt a chill run down her spine. But the windows were closed this unusually warm September night.

In that moment she realised she never knew much about Professor Charles Bennett. Of course, early in her employment Martha had told her about his education, his time in the city, his recurring profits from his inventions. Everybody knew those things. What Elsie didn't know was who Charles actually was as a person.

Where did he come from? He had lived in Eversham as long as she had been alive. Had he always lived here? Did he have family? Again, Martha spoke of her time working for him these past 25 years, but he was already a man at that point. The portraits decorating the guestroom and vestibule he acquired from auctions in the city. The paintings adorning the study he commissioned, and all involved the scenic English countryside. What are his passions? Toiling in this laboratory night and day. But Elsie thought there might be something deeper behind it all. Charles Bennett is no recluse, of that she was sure. He visited London regularly, patronised the pubs in Eversham on Saturdays; he invited friends to the house for tea, prayed to God on Sundays. Martha said he used to breed horses for sport, back when he had much more energy.

So entranced by the notes and the mystery surrounding her master, Elsie didn't hear the creaking of the wooden boards coming from the closet.

She turned around, affixing her eyes at Charles Bennett at the doorway. How long had he been there watching her??

"Silly woman! You pest! Begone!" He rasped, fumbling for a cane resting against the wall. "You're not allowed in here!"

Elsie yipped, her heart leaping into her throat. She grabbed the lantern's handle, careful not to disturb Charles' work, and rushed for the laboratory exit. Whimpering, she shut the door and galloped to her room, nearly tearing her stocking in the process. It was so late that nobody was stirring, but Elsie thought the house was going to collapse upon her.

For the next ten minutes she paced her room like a caged animal. Was this the end? Surely she would be fired; nobody except Martha was allowed in to the laboratory, and even she had a strange reluctance to disturb him there. The morning would come, Martha would discover her intrusion and order her to pack her bags. Where would she go? What would she do? There weren't many options for an unmarried woman in the countryside. Her parents were both deceased, and she wouldn't tolerate living with her playboy brother in the city. Her sisters were all married off somewhere.

And then morning came.

"Deary! 'Ave you seen a ghost, luv?" Jonas, the cook, asked after breakfast. Elsie was helping Edward clear the table as Jonas set to work dressing a roast pig for dinner that afternoon.

"Not a wink of shuteye, by the looks of it. Poor thing." Doted Edward.

Elsie straightened her posture, smoothing out the wrinkles in her apron and dress from the night before. She stayed up all night wondering what fate awaited her in the morning. Sitting at the table opposite Charles, watching him spread jam on his bread, she waited for his pronouncement. But he seemed calm, relaxed, tranquil. He seemed like he forgot about the encounter with Elsie in the laboratory the night before. The warm smile he paid her upon entering the kitchen that morning confusing the poor young woman.

"It is nothing!" Elsie laughed. "If anything I would say Jonas saw the ghost this morning... watching master Charles inspect that new recipe of yours."

Edward nodded serenely as Jonas folded his arms. "I heard it from that lass over yonder last Saturday. She's from the Orient. She says a right stuck pig this time of year brings good luck to the master."

"She says a lot of things," Edward whispered politely, his butler's attire hanging loosely off his gaunt figure. Edward and Jonas banter back and forth, leaving Elsie to attend to her daily chores: whatever Martha assigns her to do.

Making the beds, plucking fresh flowers in the field, and gathering supplies from the local market gave Elsie time to think. As the day progressed, she began to think the encounter with the professor the night before was a fantasy. Something she made up in her mind. A fevered manifestation of her guilt at snooping around in there? That must be it, she reasoned, given her master's cheerful attitude today. He never saw her in there because he was asleep. Just her overactive imagination once again.

As she laid in bed and tried to get a quick nap, Martha interrupted her thoughts. She called into the maid's room.

"Elsie! Master Bennett wishes to speak with you!" Elsie couldn't tell Martha's demeanor, but all the foreboding returned once again. This was it, she feared.

***


Charles rested in a chair next to the fireplace when Elsie appeared across the room. Since it was mid-day, there was no fire in the hearth. Only in his eyes.

"Elsie, my sweet." He gestured her to come closer. "To begin, please accept my apology for my outburst last night. It was quite unbecoming of me."

Elsie gasped. So it happened after all! His harsh voice rang in her ears: Silly woman! You pest! Begone!

"I can see I've traumatised you, poor girl." He continued, sighing deeply. "You had startled me. There, there! It's nothing to fret over, perhaps there was a greater meaning behind our chance encounter. Do you know what kind of device I am working on?"

"No, sir!" Elsie lied. "I was... was just... opening the window to let the heat out. It was dreadfully warm and stuffy last night."

She felt his glare for a moment, then his face softened again. "Of course, Elsie. The device I am working on... well, have you heard of electricity? It is a new power source, much better than oil or coal they say. If I am to get this device working it will need a lot of power, something only electricity can provide. So I am to travel to London and meet with some friends, see if they cannot procure such a contraption."

He waited for a response. She gave none, simply standing there as they studied each other. He noted her youthful, fair skin. Supple waist. Long brunette hair.

"You look disheveled." Charles stated matter-of-factly. "Martha says she heard you pacing last night."

"Did she?" Replied Elsie. "You know that good woman has a heart of gold sometimes! It's so heavy it weighs upon her thoughts."

"Of course. She has served me well over the years." Out of his pocket, Charles drew a paperback book. It was thick, well loved, dog-eared, and one of Elsie's favourite novels. He looked at the cover. "Jane Eyre by Charlotte Brontë. You've read this?"

Elsie nodded.

"I've seen you reading a lot. Good thing to be properly educated."

"Yes, it certainly is, sir." She nodded again. "Begging your pardon, sir, but may I ask what it was you used to teach?"

"What's that, now? Teach?" He frowned.

Elsie clutched her arm. "Well, if I'm not talking out of turn, Martha says you used to be a professor." She trailed off.

"Oh yes, that was another lifetime ago." He muttered. Clearing his throat, he asked, "I realise there is a lot you don't know about me. Nor I, you. We should learn more about each other... from a strictly professional standpoint of course."

"Of course," Elsie echoed.

"Not now though. These bones ache... please help me up, will you?" Charles said, as she helped him rise from his chair. She handed him his cane, and he steadied himself. "Fetch me a carriage. I'm going to London. But before you ready my personal effects, I do have one more request of you."

Elsie braced herself. What might the professor want of her?

"There's no way i'm getting in, i knew this was a bad idea!"

"Just calm down man, i'm telling you we'll get in."

It was Saturday night and you were currently stood outside in the cold in the line for a club called The Razor, which apparently was the coolest nightclub in the whole city, along with your best friend Matt, his older Cousin Angela and her two friends. The reason you were so agitated was due to the fact that both you and Matt were only 17 and the two large burly looking bouncers would soon be looking you up and down to see if you were old enough to get in. It was okay for Matt, he'd always looked older than he actually was, having started shaving when he was only like 12, but you'd always looked young for your age and you just knew you'd get spotted and publicly humiliated infront of the entire crowd.

"Stay close to Angela and you'll be ok", Matt said encouragingly tapping you on the shoulder. That was of course the sole reason you'd gone to the club with his cousin, they were all over 21 and the idea was that sticking close to them would fool the bouncers into thinking you were the same age, and while this plan had sounded good several hours ago back in Matt's bedroom the reality now was somewhat different, you felt like you couldn't possibly stick out anymore if you were standing in only your underpants howling at the moon.

"Okay, here we go", Angela said watching the two people infront move into the club, "just act casual."

You stepped forward towards the bouncers and tried your best to stay out of their line of sight just behind Angela's two friends. "You all together?" one of them asked.

"Yeah, the five of us", Angela said without missing a beat. He looked her up and down for a minute, then the others, his eyes flashing on you for a brief second before returning to Angela.

"Alright, in you go."

You breathed a silent breath of relief as Angela thanked him and they started walking up the stairs, you were almost certain you weren't getting in and it seemed like a miracle that you were. Matt turned and gave you a encouraging thumbs up before following his cousin into the club.

"Wait a minute pal," a deeper voice then said and you felt a hand landing on your shoulder. You looked round and saw the other bouncer staring you square in the eyes unconvinced, "how old are you?"

You gulped uncontrollably and panicked for a moment, looking up at Matt and the others as they continued into the club unaware. "Eh, i'm...21", you finally responded nervously, though you could tell from the look in the bouncer's eye that he wasn't buying it.

"You got any ID?"

"Shit", you thought, ""You're fucked now!"

Having no back up plan and seeing that Matt and the others were completely out of view, you accepted defeat. They'd obviously wandered in oblivious to the fact that you weren't actually still behind them and even if they did notice, Matt had been raving about getting into the club for weeks now, no point you both missing out. "No sorry i don't," you said dropping your head, feeling like a complete tool.

It didn't take long for you to get directed out of the line as you tried to hide your face in embarrassment from the rest of the people there. Somehow you just knew this would happen, it always seemed to for you.

"Ah well fuck it", you said quietly to yourself, "guess i'll go home and play on the XBox."

"You don't want to go in there anyway fella trust me," a low sultry voice like honey suddenly spoke from behind you, "that place is a dump."

You turned your head to see the mystery speaker and were confronted with the most breathtakingly beautiful woman you'd ever seen in your life. She was like something out of a comic or a cartoon come to life, long blond flowing hair cascading down her shoulders and back, sparkling blue eyes, full red pouting lips, soft lightly tanned skin, her body was like an hourglass clothed in a little red strapless dress her gigantic chest proudly spilling out. info.brief_description: Inspired by Federation, a new interactive story. GPs awarded for chapters.
info.description:
A collection of body swap and possession stories. Basic rules:
No killing.
Use good grammar.
Keep names constant.


1st Story = Clothes Swapping.
You gain the ability to swap bodies/body parts with people by wearing their clothes.
Swaps are permanent until another person's clothes are worn.

2nd Story = Basic body swapping.
You are blessed with the ability to switch bodies with any other person.

3rd Story = Trait swapper.
You can swap the physical traits of any two people, yourself included.
People may or may not be aware of the changes.

4th Story = Remote swapper.
You find a device that can swap people's body parts and personalities etc.
The remote has different settings, so you can decide if people are aware they have been swapped or not.

5th Story = Head swapping.
You gain the ability to manually switch people's heads around, your own included. People are aware of what has happened to them.

6th Story = Possession powers.
You gain the ability to leave your body and possess others.
Your body is asleep until you return to it.
You can enter other people's bodies however you like.

7th Story = The Curse.
You are cursed by an elderly gypsy woman to switch bodies with people randomly.
You do not have control over when you swap or who you swap with.

8th Story = Personality Switch.
You discover a device that can swap people's personalities and mannerisms, without swapping their physical bodies/body parts.

9th Story = Body Morphing Gun.
A unique ray gun is discovered by the main character that allows him to transform his own or any other person's body/body parts.

10th Story = Absorbtion Powers + More.
You are a young woman named Jill, 29, who is abducted by aliens and given extraordinary powers, you are able to absorb, swap, morph other people. You can also transform people into animals or inanimate objects or create hybrids by merging people together (including yourself). 'Ghost mode' will also allow you to fly and pass through solid matter or possess other people's bodies/body parts.

11th Story...Whatever you like, go wild!!
